wikipedia_page.main: Ravinder Singh Tut (born 23 May 1969) is a British wrestler. He competed in the men's freestyle 62 kg at the 1988 Summer Olympics.

response: * Ravinder Singh Tut, wrestler who competed in the men's freestyle 62 kg at the 1988 Summer Olympics
